Hello,
I was trying to run 1D flame calculations with the hydrogen mechanis=
m 
of Connaire et al but the program had problems with the input. After 
sp=
ending some time I found that the subroutine ck2ctml contains a small 
bug.=
 For formatting purposes it adds a line break `\n' after every ten 
substan=
ces. When the number of substances is dividable by ten this 
subroutine add=
s two line breaks. It results in crashing in completely 
different part of =
the program when the chemical mechanism is written to 
file because only on=
e line break is expected. The mechanism of Connaire 
et al. unfortunately h=
as exactly ten species. The fix is quite simple. 
How can we commit it in t=
he code?
Best regards, Anatoli
